botWelcome: Hello! I'm your RTIRS admin assistant. I'm here to help you with incident reporting, checking status, and providing support. For urgent emergencies, please call 100 (Police), 101 (Fire), or 108 (Ambulance). For RTIRS support, call our helpline: 1800-425-0425 (24/7).
botError: Sorry, I'm having trouble responding right now. Please try again later or contact our helpline: 1800-425-0425

checkReportStatus: How to check my report status?
reportCategories: What types of incidents can I report?
